name: Android Ain't Even That Bad
description:
⚠️ Game will be much better with audio! ⚠️ : Game Info :

Oh no! Looks like your Android phone has led you to this completely unknown location  guarded by Apple! (Common bug). Apple's weakness is BAZOOKA, luckily there happens to be pieces of BAZOOKA  inside some of the houses!

: Controls :

WASD - Move

LSHIFT - Sprint

SPACE - Jump

LCLICK - Flash

C - Crouch

P - Pause & Settings

: Useful Info :

- The bazooka pieces spawn randomly each game

- There are 7 bazooka pieces to collect

- Notification sound goes off randomly every 15-40 seconds.

- Houses block Apple's sight

Check out my other games!: https://zetario.itch.io

* Game may lag on browser, download for better performance! *
